<?php /** @var WP_Query $query */ $query = new WP_Query( [ 'post_type' => 'post', 'posts_per_page' => -1, 'post_status' => 'publish' ] ); ?>
<?php if ( $query->have_posts() ) : ?>
<?php while ( $query->have_posts() ) : $query->the_post(); ?>
<?php endwhile; ?>
<?php endif; ?>
<?php wp_reset_postdata(); ?>
